product_name: Seagate Barracuda 1TB 3.5" 7200 RPM SATA III Internal HDD
description: The Seagate Barracuda 1TB HDD provides reliable and fast storage with a 7200 RPM rotation speed. It uses a SATA III interface for quick data transfers. With a 64MB cache, it's suitable for gaming and general storage needs. The 3.5-inch form factor makes it compatible with desktop PCs and workstations.

product_name: Seagate IronWolf 4TB 3.5" 5900 RPM SATA III NAS Internal HDD
description: The Seagate IronWolf 4TB HDD is purpose-built for NAS (Network-Attached Storage) systems. It operates at 5900 RPM and utilizes a SATA III interface, making it ideal for continuous data access. With a 64MB cache, it delivers reliable performance in a NAS environment, ensuring data integrity and accessibility.

product_name: Seagate FireCuda 2TB 3.5" 7200 RPM SATA III Internal SSHD
description: The Seagate FireCuda 2TB SSHD combines the speed of an SSD with the capacity of an HDD. With a 7200 RPM rotation speed and a SATA III interface, it delivers fast data access. The 64MB cache enhances performance for gaming and multitasking. This SSHD is designed for both speed and storage capacity.
